Lyric:
[00:53.000]There's a lady who's sure
[00:57.000]All that glitters is gold
[00:59.000]And she's buying a stairway to heaven.
[01:06.000]When she gets there she knows
[01:09.000]If the stores are all closed
[01:12.000]With a word she can get what she came for.
[01:21.000]Ooh, ooh, and she's buying a stairway to heaven.
[01:35.000]There's a sign on the wall
[01:37.000]But she wants to be sure
[01:39.000]'Cause you know sometimes words have two meanings.
[01:46.000]In a tree by the brook
[01:50.000]There's a songbird who sings,
[01:53.000]Sometimes all of our thoughts are misgiven.
[02:19.000]Ooh, it makes me wonder,
[02:27.000]Ooh, it makes me wonder.
[02:38.000]There's a feeling I get
[02:41.000]When I look to the west,
[02:44.000]And my spirit is crying for leaving.
[02:50.000]In my thoughts I have seen
[02:53.000]Rings of smoke through the trees,
[02:56.000]And the voices of those who stand looking.
[03:10.000]Ooh, it makes me wonder,
[03:18.000]Ooh, it really makes me wonder.
[03:29.000]And it's whispered that soon
[03:32.000]If we all call the tune
[03:34.000]Then the piper will lead us to reason.
[03:40.000]And a new day will dawn
[03:44.000]For those who stand long
[03:46.000]And the forests will echo with laughter.
[04:19.000]If there's a bustle in your hedgerow
[04:23.000]Don't be alarmed now,
[04:25.000]It's just a spring clean for the May queen.
[04:30.000]Yes, there are two paths you can go by
[04:34.000]But in the long run
[04:36.000]There's still time to change the road you're on.
[04:49.000]And it makes me wonder.
[05:06.000]Your head is humming and it won't go
[05:10.000]In case you don't know,
[05:12.000]The piper's calling you to join him,
[05:18.000]Dear lady, can you hear the wind blow,
[05:21.000]And did you know
[05:23.000]Your stairway lies on the whispering wind.
[06:44.000]And as we wind on down the road
[06:48.000]Our shadows taller than our soul.
[06:52.000]There walks a lady we all know
[06:57.000]Who shines white light and wants to show
[07:02.000]How ev'rything still turns to gold.
[07:06.000]And if you listen very hard
[07:11.000]The tune will come to you at last.
[07:16.000]When all are one and one is all
[07:21.000]To be a rock and not to roll.
[07:44.000]And she's buying a stairway to heaven.
